inclusion.criterion: Children with ASA I (American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status Grade I)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: normal healthy patients or ASA II (American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status Grade II) = (patients with mild systemic disease and no functional limitations)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Children with central nervous system disorders & neurological problems.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Children with inborn errors of metabolism.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Children with known allergy to dexmedetomidine, midazolam or ketamine.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Children with recent or chronic administration of sedative drugs, antipsychotics or tranquilizers.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Wilson disease confirmed by high liver copper concentration. He has a constant smile on his face and aggressive behavior.
